pullRequest.title: [TA] Update Sample README and README for OpinionMining and PII endpoints.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Update Sample README and README for OpinionMining and PII endpoints.
fixes: #14274

nodes.bodyText:
We could make this stand out more by adding it to the description of Analyze Sentiment.
What about something like:
Run a Text Analytics predictive model to identify the positive, negative, neutral or mixed sentiment contained in the 
provided document or batch of documents.
To get more granular information about the opinions related to aspects of a product/service, also knows as Aspect-based Sentiment Analysis in Natural Language Processing (NLP), see sample on sentiment analysis with opinion mining see [here][analyze_sentiment_with_opinion_mining_sample].
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -222,6 +222,7 @@ documentSentiment.getSentences().forEach(sentenceSentiment ->
     System.out.printf("Analyzed sentence sentiment: %s.%n", sentenceSentiment.getSentiment()));
 ```
 For samples on using the production recommended option `AnalyzeSentimentBatch` see [here][analyze_sentiment_sample].
+For samples on sentiment analysis with opinion mining see [here][analyze_sentiment_with_opinion_mining_sample].

nodes.bodyText: Do you think there is value on showing this for batch too? nothing changes here, so it is the same as the single document sample.
nodes.diffHunk:
